components.description: This includes services related to reaching support via phone, email, and chat.

incidents.name: SMS Delivery Delays to Vodacom Network in South Africa

incident_updates.body: We are experiencing SMS delivery delays when sending messages to Vodacom network in South Africa. Our engineers are working with our carrier partner to resolve the issue. We will provide another update in 1 hour or as soon as more information becomes available.

affected_components.name: CARRIER NETWORK - SMS, Middle East & Africa

scheduled_maintenances.name: Italy Account Security Carrier Partner Maintenance - Wind Tre

incident_updates.body:
Our carrier partner Wind Tre Italy is conducting a planned maintenance from 08 June 2024 at 14:00 PDT until 08 June 2024 at 20:00 PDT. During the maintenance window, there could be intermittent API request failures for Wind Tre Italy customers.

Impacted Products: Verify Silent Network Auth, Lookup SIM Swap, Lookup Identity Match, Legacy Identity MatchAndAttributes

affected_components.name: CARRIER NETWORK - Verify Silent Network Auth

scheduled_maintenances.name: United Kingdom Account Security Carrier Partner Maintenance - Vodafone

scheduled_maintenances.name: Russia SMS Carrier Maintenance - Megafon and Yota

incident_updates.body:

Note, the maintenance will be carried out on each of the following dates and times:

10 June 2024 at 13:00 PDT until 10 June 2024 at 17:00 PDT
13 June 2024 at 13:00 PDT until 13 June 2024 at 17:00 PDT
